actions.subcommittee: Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Early Childhood, Elementary, and Secondary Education

official_title: To direct the Secretary of Education to establish a program to provide grants for cardiopulmonary resuscitation and automated external defibrillator training in public elementary and secondary schools.
short_title: Teaching Children to Save Lives Act of 2013
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text: Teaching Children to Save Lives Act of 2013 - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to award grants to local educational agencies or public elementary or secondary schools to implement nationally recognized cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) and automated external defibrillator (AED) training courses. Allows a grant to be used to purchase an AED training device if the grantee implements or has implemented an AED training program in conjunction with a CPR training program.

titles.title: Teaching Children to Save Lives Act of 2013

To direct the Secretary of Education to establish a program to provide grants for cardiopulmonary resuscitation and automated external defibrillator training in public elementary and secondary schools.
